titleStmt.title: Certayne sermons, or homelies appoynted by the kynges Maiestie, to be declared and redde, by all persones, vicars, or curates, euery Sondaye in their churches, where they haue cure. Anno 1547.
Certain sermons or homilies appointed to be read in churches. Book 1.
titleStmt.author: Cranmer, Thomas, 1489-1556.
Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: The laste daie of Iulii, in the first yere of the reigne of our souereigne lord Kyng Edvvard the. VI: by Rychard Grafton printer to his moste royall Maiestie,
publicationStmt.date: In the yere of our Lorde. M. D. XLVII [1547]]

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Ends on Z4. In title: "homelies"; C3v line 6 has: "forgeuenes".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the first yere of the reigne of our souereigne lord Kyng Edvvard the. VI:
